Name: Teriyaki chicken
Description: Teriyaki DIY sauce over chicken and broccoli, serve with rice.
Steps: Mix soy, ginger, garlic, sesame, sake,sugar, 1 cup of water
Lay chicken in pan, marinate in teriyaki sauce
high heat to thicken sauce (5 min?)
Add vegetables, have on medium/high heat for 6 minutes (lid on?)
Notes: Used weird amino acid replacement, still, was good [2020/03/24]
